title: DDFP 225: A.J. Hawk on Richard Sherman, Roger Goodell & Oscars
itunes:title: DDFP 225: A.J. Hawk on Richard Sherman, Roger Goodell & Oscars
description:
Shek & Rank are joined in Studio 66 by 2013 Sheky Award winner (in the category of Best Player Guest) and Green Bay Packers linebacker A.J. Hawk for a rangy discussion on the title games, Seahawks cornerback Richard Sherman's antics, cold-weather football and soup on Lambeau Field's sidelines. They also talk Tom Hanks' acting, and meeting NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell for the first time. Also, be sure to follow @NFLcomLIVE -- the official handle for the "NFL.com LIVE: Super Bowl XLVIII" show featuring Dave Dameshek and Adam Rank. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
